title: Shambhala Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Juice bar, Take-out, Guatemalan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mostly vegetarian cafe and restaurant offering limited meat options (mostly sandwiches). Comfortable, relaxing outdoor seating in the back. Varying menu including authentic Indian food, healthy snacks, a variety of desserts, some of which are vegan. Mint lemonade and herbal teas are available. Holds special events most Sundays. Located halfway up the main road from the boat dock walking toward the main square, on the left, a bit before Paco Real.
streetAddress: Halfway up the main road from the boat dock
